title: The Oasis 2013
description:
THE OASIS

 Cast - Rajatava Dutta, Mir Afsar Ali, Saptarshi Ray, Rini Ghosh

 Director - Saptaswa Basu

A digital short film exploring the perils of having our privacy hacked.The film shows the paranoia that  arises when we experience that our private moments are watched and recorded 24x7 through a new ground breaking technology, which can capture human thoughts in the form of images.

Screened at - KSFF, Bangalore Film Fest, BYOFF 2013 (Puri), etc

Available on ADEYS TV, SMART TV, ROKU, GoogleTV, etc
